name: Snake-Pix
description:
Snake-Pix was developed as a prototype game for a challenge from Vivo Keyd and FIAP, a brazilian university. I created this prototype in 2020 with a small group of friends from FIAP. The game was inspired by several references: Snake Games, Tetris, Infinity Runners...

Currently it has just 1 stage and 1 boss, but we intend on creating more stages if we win the challenge. 

I was responsible for programming, game design and some interface and art features.

Snake-Pix was created with Unity Engine and it is for Android, but I also have a PC version to play with mouse.  

Language: Portuguese.
